name: Pelota Circuit
description:
In Pelota Circuit you will be competing in a ten-marbles race to reach the first place, but your ability taking the curves won't be enough, because your marble will be losing speed with the time and you will require to recharge it on pits as a racing car changes its tyres to go faster. You will also have available one speed boost to be used whenever you want after a certain moment in the race. Would you be able to make the perfect strategy to get to the top?

Features

Detailed circuit

Competitive IA marbles

Pit strategy

Warning: Pelota Circuit is a personal project. Completely developed by one single person as a hobby project. This is my very first serious video-game project then I'm 100% beginner in all related to developing. Most mistakes and bugs can be found.

This game is also under development and it is expected to add more circuits and maybe a few more features in the future, but it will be all the time, 100% free to download. Thank you very much for giving it a chance and leaving your opinions.

Planned features

  • At least four different circuits with different designs, lengths and decorations.
  • Skin selection.
  • UI improvement.
  • More detailed skins than just a flat color for each marble.
